Description: Head from monumental quartzite statue of Amenhotep III wearing red crown.

James and Davies 1983 / Egyptian Sculpture (p. 38, fig. 45)
Bryan 1987 / Portrait Sculpture of Thutmose IV (p. 8)
Müller 1988 / Die Kunst Amenophis' III und Echnatons (IV: p. 27; p. 34; p. 44; p. 60; p. 151, fig 10b; I: p. 39)
